name: QuickMenuAccessibility
author: kafeijao
description:
__**Features**__:
- Swap Quick Menu to Right Hand.
- Swap buttons for Quick Menu with the Main Menu.
- Make Quick Menu spawn in world space.
- Change the Quick and Menu buttons to Cycle between menus.
- When loses tracking on one hand, the QM is set to World Space and cycle menus with single key is turned on.

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/QuickMenuAccessibility) for more in-depth info.
changelog: - Updated the namespace of MenuScalePatch to match the newer version.
